title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 205.51 - Proceedings involving custody of a Native American child
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 205.51 - Proceedings involving custody of a Native American child

State Regulations

In any proceeding in which the custody of a
child is to be determined, the petition shall set forth whether the child is a

Native American child subject to the Indian Child Welfare Act of 1978
(25 USC
1901
-
1963
) and the court
shall proceed further, as appropriate, in accordance with the provisions of
that act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
205.51

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
